inn1.comm: good start, in the channel outside off stump and some good away movement, left alone to the keeper
edged, and just short of Misbah at first slip! Short and wide, there to cut, gets a thick outside edge but Misbah's standing a touch too deep there. Takes it on the half-volley
beauty! Kicked off the pitch and swung away just as Dilshan prodded at it off the back foot
much fuller this time, seemed to hold its line, outside off again and Dilshan lets it go
short of a good length outside off and leaving the right hander, Dilshan lets it go
on the stumps, good length on middle and leg, defended watchfully off the back foot to the bowler
good start, good length outside off and swinging away from the left hander, Jayasuriya fishes for it but is done in by the movement
much fuller and some decent bounce for the bowler, outside off again and the batsman is half-forward pushing at it, is beaten by the away swing once again
nipped back in this time, good length outside off and Jayasuriya watched it closely through to the keeper this time
beaten again, the away swinger, full outside off and drawing Jayasuriya forward, he drives at it but misses as the ball leaves him
short of a length, spat off the pitch moving into the batsman, Jayasuriya had shaped himself for a cut there but the inward movement and the bounce led to him just mistiming it towards cover
the end of another good over, fuller on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
good length outside off stump, gets forward to defend, gets a thick outside edge all along the ground to third man. Sri Lanka off the mark
short of a good length on middle and leg, Jayasuriya fends it away to the leg side for a single
angling into the right hander, pitched on a good length on middle and off, defended to mid-on off the front foot
goes for it and misses, was not to the pitch there but had made up his mind to go through with the shot, short of a good length outside of and he tries to loft it over extra cover, predictably misses
beaten, full outside off and swinging away, goes for an expansive drive through the covers, misses again
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully into the off side towards cover
bang on target, good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
just a fraction full outside off stump and Jayasuriya goes for it, slashes hard from the crease, gets a thick outside edge and the ball flies over second slip to the third-man boundary
shorter and much slower, swings in a touch, outside off but wide enough for Jayasuirya to leave it alone
short of a good length outside off again, working up some good pace this time, a touch of inward movement, carries to the keeper at a good height

edged and wide of Younis Khan at gully, short of a length outside off, Jayasuriya plays it with soft hands, flies off the outside edge wide of a diving Younis towards third man. He had no chance there though.
full outside off and holding its line, mistimes a drive to mid-off
good length on the off stump, just drops it on the off side on the front foot and rushes off for a single

dropped, a chance gone begging, full outside off stump, Dilshan gets a touch forward and slices it towards point where Salman Butt fails to cup a sharp chance, the ball flicks his fingers on its way to the point boundary

good fielding but Dilshan had made it safely, dropped on the off side and rushes for a single, Gul picks it cleanly and throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end while turning back, Dilshan though is well in
good length outside off stump, swinging back in a touch, left alone
on the stumps this time, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
outside edge again but took off his bottom hand at the right time, on the off stump and hits the pitch hard, the ball rolls down towards third man
good length outside off and gets some late away movement, Jayasuirya lets it go and the ball gets to the keeper on the bounce
on middle and off, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
short of a good length on leg stump, turned away to midwicket off the back foot
hitting the pitch hard again, banged in short on middle and off, Jayasuriya is nicely behind it and drops it on the off side
mistimes a loft over mid-off, not quite there to the pitch, lands on a good length on the off stump, he goes through with his shot that comfortably evades the mid-off fielder

dropped, would be a little unfair to call it though! Full outside off stump and Jayasuriya drives at it with little footwork, the ball flies off the outside edge wide of first slip but Younis Khan at gully flings himself to his right Jonty style and manages to get his fingers to it, but fails to hang on. Valiant attempt.
worked away on the leg side off the front foot for a single
short of a length on the leg stump, tries to fend it away on the leg side, is hit on the thighs
good length on the off stump, defended with soft hands off the front foot towards point
banged in short outside off, Dilshan thought of pulling it, but was a touch too high and backs away at the right moment
goes for an audacious pull charging forward this time, short of a good length on middle and leg, he fails to connect well though, mistimes it to mid-on and salvages a single
short on leg stump, is struck on the gloves as he tries to play it on the leg side, gets a single
good length on the off stump, defended firmly off the front foot to cover
short outside off and Jayasuirya is down the track, he tries to cut that over point but misses as he fails to reach it
on the pads, pitched outside leg and moved into the batsman, he tries to glance it down fine, is struck on the pads
short of a length outside off, chopped down wide of point off the back foot
full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a quick single
starts off well, in the channel outside off and moving away, left alone
short of a length on middle and off, what is Dilshan doing here? He's down the track and mistimes a pull uppishly towards mid-on
fuller outside off but there's not much room for Jayasuriya to launch himself into it, he just lets it go
goes for it this time, but is done in by the inward movement. Full outside off and swings in just as he goes for a powerful drive through the covers
full on the leg stump, tries to work it away fine, gets a leg bye
straying on the pads again, but there's cover in the deep, flicked away uppishly towards fine leg for a single
short of a length outside off and hint of away movement, there's not much room there as Dilshan tries to cut, the bounce as well as the swing deceive him
full on the pads again, tries to flick it away off the front foot, fails to make contact again, is struck on the pads.
full on the pads and connects well this time, turned away uppishly off his legs towards the deep square leg fielder
down the track to a good length ball on leg stump, mistimes it short of midwicket for a quick single
short of a good length outside off, pushes at it off the back foot, gets an inside edge that's fielded well at leg slip. Gets his fingers to it and saves a couple of runs
he's struggling again here, short of a length on middle and bounces more than Dilshan had expected, is hit where he shouldn't be hit as he tries to work that way on the leg side
perhaps the first convincing shot of the entire day, full outside off, length ball, in the slot for Jayasuriya who dismisses it over mid-off for a cleanly hit boundary
attempts a similar shot again but mistimes it, falls just wide of Umar Gul and mid-off
short of a good length on the off stump, dropped short of point and he sneaks in a quick single
good bounce again, short on the off stump, tries to drag it onto the leg side, hits the top-half of the bat and lands on the pitch
much fuller on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, dropped short of cover and sets off for a quick single
Jayasuriya survives again, short of a good length on the off stump, comes down the track to heave it over midwicket, gets the top edge and the ball lands safely in the third-man region
short on leg stump, mistimes a pull to fine leg
good length on the off stump, pushed to mid-off on the front foot
short of a length on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to the bowler
good length on the off again, defended off the front foot towards cover
short of a length on the off stump, is down the track and slashes it away to deep point

appeal for run out, full on the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot and calls for a quick single. He sets off but Jayasuriya sends him back, Afridi picks it up cleanly and throws down the stumps at the strikers end but Dilshan has dragged his bat back in time. They get a run off the ricochet
short of a length outside off, is down the track and slaps it crisply to mid-off. Well hit but failed to pierce the field
short and wide, struck off the back foot wide of deep point for a couple
full on middle and leg, tries to turn it away towards midwicket, gets a leading edge wide of the bowler. There was late away movement there for Ifti
on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket and they run well to get back for the second

Both openers have had their share of luck and Dilshan survives yet again, it's short on the off stump, tries to pull it away towards square leg, gets the top-edge that lands safely between a Kamran Akmal running back and a third man charging in
short of a length on middle and off, defended watchfully off the back foot to the bowler
short of a length outside off, chopped down to point off the back foot
lands on a good length outside leg, tries to work it down fine, is struck on the thighs and they run a quick single
full on the off stump, tries to drive it back past the bowler off the front foot, gets an inside edge onto his pads
good length outside off and moved away after pitching, left alone to the keeper
short and wide, there to cut, the bounces a touch more than he expected, misses
that's out of the ground, length ball outside off and Jayasuriya gets under it to lift it cleanly over the long-on boundary for a big one. Good sound of bat striking ball
poor ball, full outside off, and Jayasuriya reaches for it from the crease to loft it over extra cover for a one bounce four
Ifti is struggling now and Jayasuriya is opening up, short outside off, slapped back powerfully past the bowler and wide of mid-on for a boundary

another one, but that's five wides, banged in short on middle, Jayasuriya is down the track and tries to upper-cut that one over the keeper, fails to connect but it's too high anyway and the keeper has no chance holding onto that one
bouncer banged in short outside leg stump, given a no-ball for bowling the second bouncer in the over
on target this time much to the relief of his captain, on middle and off, defended back to the bowler.

Jayasuriya is riding his luck here, short outside off and Jayasuriya comes down the track, also giving himself some room to play the cut over point, gets a thick outside edge and the ball flies off to the third-man boundary
pitched full outside leg stump and moving into Jayasuriya, he tries to work that down fine, misses, and they get a leg bye

gone this time!! Deceived by the slower ball. Short on the leg stump and Jayasuriya had prepared himself for another aggressive shot, failed to spot the slower ball and went through with an attempted pull, mistimed it straight to Saeed Ajmal at mid-on who made no mistake.
short of a length outside off, struck off the back foot to deep cover

missed run out, shaky start and almost a run out, short of a good length on the off stump, cramed for room as he tries to drop it on the off side, gets an inside edge towards midwicket where the fielder misses a direct hit at the non-strikers end. Dilshan was halfway down the pitch and would have been miles out of his ground had that hit
good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
much fuller, defended watchfully on the off side
full on the off stump, driven back firmly off the front foot wide of mid-on for three runs
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the off side to cover
bowled flat outside leg stump, some spin into the left hander, swept away really fine and fine leg dives full length to his left to save a run
bowled flat on the off stump, defended off the front foot on the off side
short of a length on middle, makes room and cuts it away wide of Afridi at point for a well run two
flat and quick on middle and leg, tries to work it away on the leg side, is struck on the pads. That was missing leg
full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg for a single
he continues to get punished, that was a poor ball, short on the off stump, pulled away over mid-on for a one bounce four. Good clean hit
short outside off again, rolls his wrists over it to pull it straight to deep square leg
much better, good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to mid-off
short of a good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
shot! Full outside off and Sangakkara pulls off a textbook off-drive, getting forward and playing with a straight bat wide of mid-off for a boundary
short on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg for a single
tossed up outside off, pushed off the front foot to long-off
flighted outside off, driven crisply off the front foot wide of mid-off, deep point runs a mile to drag it back and keep the batsmen to three
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for a single
on middle and leg, flicked away off the front foot to midwicket, sets off for a single but is wisely sent back
too straight, on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg for a single
flat on the off stump, defended comfortably towards cover
dipping into the right hander, flighed on the off stump, driven to mid-off
pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
held it back a touch, lands short of a length on middle and off, pushed off the back foot wide of mid-on for a single
tossed up on the off stump, pushed to long-off
tossed up, lands on a good length on the off stump, defended on the leg side
short on the leg stump, Sangakkara misses out, he plays it straight to the short fine leg fielder
tossed up on the off stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
flighted outside off, paddled down to fine leg
short and wide, cut away through the point fielder, who fumbles, to allow the batsmen a couple
flighted on middle and leg, gets outside the line and turns it away late towards fine leg for a single
flat, quick, and bowled short outside off, Dilshan waits for it and cuts it away wide of the point fielder for a couple more
short of a good length outside off, gets outside the line and tries to paddle it down fine, is hit on the pads
tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to long-off
drags it from outside the off stump to paddle it down to fine leg
flighted outside off, opens the face to guide it wide of point for a single
short outside off, cut away powerfully to point off the back foot
short of a length on the off stump, played away firmly to deep midwicket off the back foot
quicker delivery on middle and off, defended with a big stride forward on the leg side
tossed up gently on the stumps and Sangakkara defends
tossed up just outside off stump and he eases it to cover
more of the same, tossed up and no real aggression from Sangakkara
this one drops a bit too short and he goes back to pull past midwicket
tossed up with some bite and turn and it beats the bat, the doosra
tosses it up to commit Sangakkara onto the front foot in defence
flighted on the stumps and Dilshan drives inside-out to long-off
well bowled, pitches and bounces past the forward prod
shorter and sliding down the pads and he glances it for a single
bad ball, too much room on offer and he cuts square on the off side
tossed up on off stump, Dilshan backs away and steers it past cover
forces Sangakkara onto the back foot and he bunts it to extra cover
gently floated up outside off stump and he drives into the covers
rocks back and cuts the width out to deep cover for a single
better length this time and Sangakkara drives it to cover
goes back and across and chops the pull to midwicket
fuller in length, not much air, and he eases it to cover again
thats just too wide and Sangakkara cuts it in front of point, Butt chases and dives near the ropes to cut off a boundary
flighted on the off, squeezed past point for a single
flighted outside off, Dilshan gets forward and swats that down to long-off
short on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
the offspinner, spun into Sangakkara from outside leg, dropped off the front foot into the off side for a quick single
short and wide, cut away firmly to deep point
short again and Sanga steers that between cover and point for a single
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
dropped short of cover this time for an easy single
bang on the stump,s pushed in quicker, defended on the off side
consecutive fifties for Dilshan, turned away to square leg and an overthrow allows them to come back for the second. He's done well as an opener in this series
doosra, misdirected one though, bowled short and wide, cut away off the back foot wide of deep point for a couple
tossed up outside off, paddles it down to fine leg for a single
flighted on the off stump, pushed into the vacant leg side for a single
tossed up on leg stump, swept down wide of fine leg for a couple
short on the off stump, makes room and guides that behind point
flighted on the off stump, driven firmly but straight to short cover
spinning into the right hander as he tries to cut, plays it short of point and sets off
flighted on middle and leg, turned behind square
flighted on the off stump, pushed to long-off
flat outside off stump, lands full, paddled away fine for a couple. Dilshan has used that stroke on quite a few occasions today
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
the paddle again, only for a single this time, not much pace on it nor the timing
straying down the leg side, full outside leg stump and Sanga sweeps it down to the fine-leg boundary. He hit that but the umpire decided to call it a wide
flat on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
poor bowling, short and wide, Dilshan has no trouble getting on the back foot and slashing it wide of deep point for a couple more
spinning into the left hander, but it's way down the leg side
quicker ball bowled short on middle and off, defended off the front foot to the bowler
short on the off stump and gets the treatment, rocks on the back foot and strikes it firmly in front of cover all along the ground to the boundary
steered wide of point for a single
short again , makes room and cuts it well i front of square for a single
poor fielding at point, squeezed through to the fielder there who fumbles while diving unnecessarily and allows the batsmen to take two
short outside off, struck away to deep cover
tossed up on the off stump, comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
short on the off stump, driven off the back foot wide of cover
quicker ball bowled outside off, pushed with an open face wide of point
full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
flighted on the off stump, mistimes a drive to cover
tossed up on middle and leg, played away wide of midwicket for a single
flighted outside off, pushed to long-off
pushed through a touch quicker on leg stump, worked away in the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket, it doesn't travel far but they've taken two thanks to some lacklustre fielding
flighted outside off, slashed away to deep point
45th fifty for Sanga, pushed wide of midwicket off the back foot. It also brings up the 100 partnership
short outside off, cut away to point
pushed wide of cover off the front foot for a single
full outside off stump, there are plenty of vacant spaces in the off side, pushed it firmly between deep cover and deep point for three runs. You don't need boundaries if you keep playing like this
short on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler

run out, hesitation by Sangakkara and it costs him his wicket, pushed into the off side towards point, he sets off immediately and Dilshan responds but sends him back after he is halfway down the wicket, Afridi begins celebrating even before he takes down the stumps.
fired in on the leg stump, faint tickle towards fine leg
short on the off stump, pushed straight to point
flighted on the off stump, driven back past the bowler off the front foot
tossed up on leg stump, driven to deep midwicket for a single
guided off the back foot past point
short and wide, cut away straight to the point fielder
tossed up on leg stump, worked away off the front foot to deep square leg
short on leg stump and going down, tries to work it away fine, is struck on the pads
pushed away in front of square for a single on the leg side
tossed up on middle and leg, turned away towards fine leg
short and wide, cut away past point for a couple
fired in much quicker on middle, Kandamby was not prepared for it but adjusted his shot at the last moment to push it back to the bowler
driven wide of cover on the front foot for a single
short and wide, cut away to deep point
the doosra, spots it, tucks it away on the leg side for an easy single
short on middle and off, pushed to cover off the back foot
lands full on middle, almost in the block hole, dug out to midwicket
quicker one bowled short outside off, cut away deep  in front of square
poor delivery, short and wide and some away spin, cut away over point and Salman Butt runs well to his left to keep the batsmen to three
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
flighted, eased through to long-off for a single
very slow through the air, short on the off stump, pushed away wide of midwicket for a single
they continue to feed him with short balls, he's another one, cut away wide of deep point
on middle and off, pushed through to long-off for a single
the doosra landing at a perfect length for Dilshan, full outside off and he creams that through the off side wide of deep cover for a boundary
short on middle and off, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
quicker one again, defended on the leg side
short and wide, cut away straight to point, kept a touch a low there
Pakistan continue to bleed runs here, short outside off and Kandamby shapes up for a pull, gets an under-edge through the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
swept away powerfully between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a couple more
sensible batting, flighted on the off stump, driven to long-off
chopped down to point off the back foot
fired down the leg side this time, poor bowling, given a wide
short on middle and off, a poor length again, pulled away wide of midwicket this time for a couple
short of a good length on the off and spinning away a touch, pushed off the back foot to long-off
short and wide, the deep point fielder has been kept busy today by Dilsha, he's into the act again
short on middle and leg, tires to work it away wide of midwicket, gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and drives it down the ground to long-on
well struck, down the track and drives it inside out to long-off. Deserved more runs for that shot

what a shot! Beautifully timed, short outside off, he gets on the back foot and punches it powerfully wide of cover for a boundary. That raced to the fence and the deep cover fielder, despite a valiant dive, could not stop that
gives Dilshan the strike this time, eased through the off side for a single
better, on middle and leg, defended watchfully into the leg side
short on the off stump, chopped down wide of cover for a single
goes for the slog-sweep, was there to hit, full outside off stump, but mistimes it to deep midwicket.

missed run outfired in quick on middle and off, pushed to cover who runs forward and aims at the stumps, misses as the batsmen sneak a single. Could count as a missed opportunity as an under-arm flick from so close to the stumps should hit the stumps direct
flighted on middle and leg, swept down to deep square leg
arm ball bowled straight on the leg stump, pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket for a single

short and wide, atrocious delivery, he late-cuts it wide of Khurram Manzoor at deep point who dives full length to his left to drag that one in just inside the ropes. Brings up the 50 fifty partnership

missed stumping, Pakistan have been poor, flighted outside off inviting Kandamby out of the crease, he goes for a loft over extra cover but the ball spins away, he misses and so does Kamran Akmal who makes a mess of it behind the stumps
pushed through the leg side for a single
flighted on middle and leg, dropped onto the leg side
bowled flat on the pads from round the wicket, driven to deep midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and off, defended off the back foot
short and wide again, quicker, Dilshan goes for his favourite cut, misses this time
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler.
pushed wide of point for a quick single this time
full toss on leg stump, comes down the track and drives it down to long-on
short on the off stump and moving away a touch, a bouncer, left to the keeper
short on leg stump and Kandamby tries to pull that over square leg, gets the top edge and the ball lands safely behind the fielder there
good length outside off, gets forward and slices that in front of cover for a single

goes for the pull again, and the fielder makes no mistake! Short on the leg stump, tries to pull it away over the deep-square-leg boundary, gets the top-edge again and Khurram Manzoor standing int he deep runs a good distance to his left to take a well judged catch
short and wide, slashes hard and the ball flies off the outside edge to the third-man boundary. Dilshan on 98
full on the off stump, pushed off the front foot straight to short cover
the doosra, short outside off and spits away, Mahela gets on the back foot, spots it, and guides it to short third
opens the face to push it past the point fielder for a single
comes forward and drives it between cover and pint for a single
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off

he gets it, his second ODI century, The promotion to the top of the order has worked wonders. Full toss outside off, pushed to long-off and he is absolutely ecstatic. A front-runner for the Man of the Series if SL end up winning this
down the leg side, short on leg stump and going down further with the spin
poor bowling, full on middle and leg, Mahela gets down on one knee and sweeps it powerfully behind square for a boundary
full outside off stump, makes room and steers it wide of point for a single
short outside off, goes for the upper cut, misses, too close to being called a wide

I think we have an injury here, short and wide, cut away wide of third man, Saeed Ajmal dives full length to his right, and as he's trying to drag the ball back in on the second attempt, he twists his ankle, not once but twice. He's shouting in pain here and it must hurt. It does look serious, and not a pleasant sight for anyone who's watching it
full on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg for a single
poor ball, short outside off, makes room and creams that off the back foot through the covers for a boundary

full on middle and leg, a length ball, makes room to slog it over midwicket, gets a thin inside edge and ball rolls through the intended direction wide of the fielder and the batsmen still manage to get three. The boundaries are big and the field is wide spread
full on the off stump, mistimes a drive back to the bowler
full length outside off again, smashed through the covers to the fielder in the deep
short and wide, poor ball, he's lucky to get away with just a single, that's cut away straight to the deep point fielder
urrrr, maybe not! Full on middle and begging to be hit, length ball, stays in his crease and slogs that away over midwicket for a boundary
another length ball and this one's dismissed too, full outside off stump, makes room and smashes that through the covers for another four
a length ball once again but fails to connect well this time, on middle and leg, tries to repeat the slog over midwicket earlier in the over, gets an inside edge onto the pads, and they get a single
full outside off and tries to do a Dougie Marillier, tries to paddle it down fine, the ball lobs up over square leg
good change of pace, failed to pick the slower one, tries to paddle it down fine again, is hit on the thighs and the ball drops onto the off side. They get a quick single
shot! Banged in short on the off stump, upper-cuts it towards third man, not fine enough though, so he has to settle for a single
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, driven down to long-off for a single, he picked it this time
shot! Full on the pads, Mahela walks across and flicks it away over the short-fine fielder for a boundary
slower ball bowled short outside off, cut to point off the back foot
Mahela goes! Bowled full outside off stump, makes room but edges it to the keeper as he reaches for it from well outside leg stump
short and wide, there to cut, he fishes for it, but misses
another wicket! Kicked off the pitch, hit the wicket hard on middle, Kapugedera tries to fend it away on the leg side, gets the top edge and Akmal takes a good catch diving forward
short of a length on middle, there to pull, Dilshan tries doing just that, misses it completely, the ball doesn't miss the middle stump by much
Gul's unlucky here! Yorker on middle and leg, Dilshan tries to work it away on the leg side, gets a thick inside edge that evades the short-fine fielder and rolls down the boundary ropes
length ball and gets the treatment, another attempted yorker on the off stump, lands on a good length and Dilshan makes room to cart it away over extra cover for consecutive fours
bouncer banged in short on leg stump, the batsman makes room and the bowler chases him, cramped him for room there
full outside off stump, he squeezes that wide of cover for a single
slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, driven to midwicket off the front foot
slower ball bowled full outside off, makes room and drives it wide of long-off for a couple
short on leg stump, chased the batsman as he tried to make room, tries to help it on its way over the short-fine fielder, mistimes it but gets a single
attempted yorker on middle and leg, paddled to fine leg for a single
full outside off, he's already made room and fails to reach it, good start by Gul
full on middle and leg, he manages to find the gap between long-on and deep midwicket, stays his ground and strikes it uppishly between those two fielders. Excellent shot! 300 up
short and wide, deserved to go for another four but Gul has cover in the deep, cut away to deep point
short on middle and leg, goes for an expansive pull over midwicket, gets an edge onto his helmet
short on the off stump, heaved away towards deep square leg
the perfect end to the innings for SL! Full outside off, a poor length ball, struck cleanly wide of Afridi at long off, who tries fielding it with his foot, and predictably misses

inn2.comm: movement into the batsman, full outside off off and nipping in, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, driven off the front foot to cover
short of a good length outside off and moving away from the batsman, left alone to the keeper
short and wide again, goes for the cut, chopped down wide of slip where Mahela dives well to his left to save some runs
full outside off and moving away, Khurram reaches for it and drives it straight to mid-off
beaten this time, good length outside off and moving away a touch, he prods at it, misses, and the ball gets to the keeper on the bounce
Younis off the mark in style, full outside off, he leans into the drive and places it between point and cover for a boundary
beaten this time, spits off the pitch, good length outside off drawing Younis forward, he fishes for it but the ball goes away with the angle
nipped back in, good length outside off, Younis gets forward to defend, is rapped on the pads and there's an appeal. Was struck too high
beaten again, by the away swinger, short of a good length outside off, tries to defend it off the front foot, the movement away from him does him in
good length outside off and left alone this time

Younis goes! Pitched on a good length on middle and leg, Younis came forward to drive that towards mid-on, missed it and the ball raps him on the pads. Thushara goes up immediately and his appeal is upheld this time. The only question there was the height; replays indicate it may have clipped the top of leg stump. Fair call
good length outside off and swinging in, left alone to the keeper
good length again and continuing to move it into the batsman, left alone to the keeper
short and wide, holding its line this time, goes for the cut, misses
good length on the off stump, comes forward to defend, gets a thick outside edge to third man

edged and gone first ball! Pakistan in trouble here! Good length on the off stump and moving away from the left hander, Butt prods at it from the crease, gets a thick outside edge that's snapped up comfortably at first slip by Kandamby
keeps bowling in that channel on and outside off, moves in a touch this time, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length outside off and going away with the angle, left alone
fuller outside off and moving away, left alone
and again, a probing line outside off and a hint of away movement, the batsman lets it go
misses out on a cut, short and wide and there for the taking, plays it a touch too early
short of a good length on middle and leg, walks across and turns it away wide of square leg for a couple
short and wide, too wide, goes for a cut over point, misses. Given a wide though
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
pushed to cover off the front foot
nipping back in after landing on a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot into the off side
short of a length again, pushed firmly off the back foot to mid-off
full outside off, coming in, driven to mid-off off the front foot
shot! Full outside off, gets forward and drives it crisply wide of cover, Murali gives chase and keeps the batsmen down to three
good length on the off stump, opens the face to defend it to point
played to cover off the front foot, a good testing line outside the off stump
short of a length on middle and leg, swinging in a touch, tries to push it off the back foot into the off side, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a couple
in the slot, full outside off, slices it from the crease well over point for a boundary
short outside off and he goes for an expansive pull over midwicket, fails to get over it
beaten this time, good length outside off and swings away sharply after pitching, Akmal drives at it off the back foot, is done in by the movement

plumb in front! Good length on the off stump and jagged back in, kept really low and Akmal failed to get his bat down in time, was struck in line with middle and Asad Rauf had absolutely no hesitation.
full on the off stump, gets outside the line to push it to cover, gets an inside edge onto his pads
what a catch! He's plucked that out of thin air. Short outside off and he pulls it away powerfully but straight to short midwicket where Maharoof dives to his right to take a blinder.
good length outside off, pushed confidently off the front foot down to mid-off
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side off the front foot
the off stump, driven crisply off the front foot to mid-off
length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
a good length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
short of  a length outside off again, tries to defend it off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge down to third man
banged in on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
gone! Pakistan are sliding here! Short of a length just fractionally outside off, a hint of away movement just as Misbah tried to prod at it off the back foot, gets a thin edge straight to Sangakkara
straying on the pads, flicked down to fine leg
down the leg side this time, pitches outside leg and holds its line
full on middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
misdirected bouncer banged in short outside leg, left alone
pushed to midwicket off the front foot

bowled him. Afridi lets it go, but the ball swings in and crashes into the off stump. Afridi seems dumbfounded after an uncharacteristic shot from him results in his downfall. The crowds have started leaving in Lahore.
pitched on middle, defended away to the leg side
good delivery, pitched fuller on middle, Gul meets it with the full face of the bat
bouncer, and Gul ducks into it and gets hit on the helmet
length delivery on off stump, Gul stands in his crease and drives straight, he pierces the gap between the bowler and mid-off
defended towards the off side on the back foot
defended on the off side off the back foot
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
big swing from Kulasekera, angling into the right-hander, the ball smacks the pad but it's going down leg side
defended towards the off side once again
length delivery once again outside off, Gul eases on to the front foot and drives fluently past the fielder at mid-off
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
tight line and length once again around off stump, played off the back foot towards the off side
Malik gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends
Thushara pitches the ball in line with the stumps and seams the ball away from the right-hander, Malik pokes at it off the back foot and gets beaten
defended towards the off side once again
pushed towards the off side on the front foot
pushed off the back foot towards cover point
Kulasekera gets the ball to swing into the right-hander, the batsman defends on the front foot
the movement into the right-hander forces the inside edge from Gul, the ball goes towards midwicket
risky shot, Malik moved a long way across his stumps and plays the ball towards midwicket
lovely drive! Malik leans on to the front foot and hits on the up through cover, he was perfectly balanced
defended towards point off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, moving away, left alone
goes for a pull this time, its banged in short outside off, misses
bouncer banged in outside leg stump, he ducks under it comfortably
short on middle, he ges a stride forward and smashes it well over midwicket for a massive six
follows that up with a trademark off driven, full outside off, he leant into it and placed it perfectly between mid-off and cover for a boundary
drive off the front foot to cover
short of a good length outside off, guided to point off the back foot
flighted on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to midwicket
worked away through square leg for a single
went straight on, picked by Gul, defended on the off side
and again, leans forward to defend towards cover
offspinner, pitched short outside off, he gets on the back foot and punches it wide of cover for a couple
tossed up outside off and spinning in a touch, he gets forward to defend, is struck on the pads but outside the line
good length outside off, moving away a touch, left alone to the keeper
defended on the off side towards cover
turned away wide of square leg for a single
gets on the front foot and drives it wide of cover for a run
good length outside off, keeps a touch low, lets it go through to the keeper
and again, maintaining that channel outside off, carries through to the keeper at a good height
that's wide down the leg side, went straight on
fuller on middle and off, tries to work it away on the leg side, gets a leading edge short of cover
gets on the front foot to counter the spin and pushes it to midwicket
offspinner, flighted on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
spinning into the right hander, worked away off the pads wide of square leg
tossed up again, comes forward and drives that wide of mid-on for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, flicked away towards square leg
short of a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it to point off the front foot
fuller on middle and off, driven crisply off the front foot
short of a length outside off, cut away to point
short and wide again, makes room and slashes that through cover and point for a couple
nipping back in after landing on a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
shot! Full outside off, gets forward and lofts that over extra cover, cleanly hit.
flighted on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg
flighted on middle and off, driven off the front foot wide of midwicket
on middle and leg, flicked away wide of deep square leg for a couple
offspinner, pushed off the front foot to cover
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and drives that to long-on for a single

gone!! Failed to pick the straight one there, much fuller, pitched on a good length on middle and leg and held its line, Gul came forward to defend and played it with bat hidden behind his pads, and the umpire had no doubt whatsoever

edged and gone! Pakistan are being demolished here! Lands full outside off and leaving the right hander, Malik drives at it from the crease, gets a thick outside edge that is snapped up on the second attempt by Jayawardene at first slip
short of a good length on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket where a diving save prevents a run
short of a length outside off, plays away from his body, guides it to point
full outside off and swinging away, Sohail pushes at it lazily, misses
goes for a wild swing over mid-on, that was pitched full outside off, the ball flies off the outside edge well over slip for a boundary towards third man
bouncer banged in short on middle, Sohail ducks under it comfortably
flighted outside off and spun in sharply, comes forward to defend, struck on the pads but outside the line of the off stump
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
worked away to midwicket, flighted on middle and leg
doosra, fails to pick it, spun away sharply after landing on a good length outside off, comes forward to defend, misses it completely
flighted on middle and off and spun in a touch, Iftikhar didn't get a big stride forward, tried to hit it through the line, missed it completely to be struck in line with middle
flighted on middle and leg, turned away off the front foot towards deep square leg
good length on the off stump, lunges forward to defend it back to the bowler
full outside off and he has a wild swing at that, holds its line, he misses, and the keeper collects
fuller on the off stump and there's a hint of away movement, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
almost!! Good length outside off, gets forward and drives it uppishly towards Kapugedara who takes it on the half-volley diving forward. That fell inches short of him
bowled on a good length on the leg stump, makes room but the bowler chases him, all he can do is fend it away on the leg side
bouncer banged in short on middle and off, he ducks under it, though the ball didn't bounce as much as the bowler would have expected
flighted outside off, reaches forward to defend it on the leg side
tossed up on middle and leg, he charges down to Murali and drives it all along the ground to long-on
full on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
tossed up on middle and off, pushed into the off side off the front foot

gone!! It's all over!! Murali gets his 500th victim, and he's only three away from the world record. Flighted on the off stump, really slow through the air, Sohail gets down on his knee to heave it over midwicket, misses it completely to find his off stump pegged back
